channel.title: It's all shits and giggles until somebody giggles and shits
channel.description:
POST YOUR FAVORITE CATCH PHRASES AND FUNNY THINGS TO SAY HERE? :O dat caps. you know you like it.
It's all shits and giggles until somebody giggles and shits. -thanks ruby xD

item.title: It's all shits and giggles until somebody giggles and shits
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:54, topic:445054”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=547744.msg4025027#msg4025027 date=1340273139]

“Too mature for mscp, too dumb for mitb” - LilXCj.

ha!
Only a select few real MITB member’s are actually smart, the rest are young nerdy adults who think there superior than everybody else because there slightly more intelligent than the 16 year old’s in 10th grade over here at MSCP.

i.e you
[/quote]
I guess we’re both an example now.[/quote]
Not sure about you, but I’m primarily orientated from mitb…

Read full topic

item.title: It's all shits and giggles until somebody giggles and shits
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:47, topic:445054”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=547744.msg4023156#msg4023156 date=1340154930]
I am the thing that keeps you up at night, the evil that haunts every dark corner of your mind… I will never rest. And neither will you.
[/quote]
HEYYYYYYY I JUST QUOTED YOU
AND THIS IS CRAAAAAAAAZYY
HERES MY PROFILE
REP ME MAYBE?

~ravekitty.[/quote]
Lol. Nice one. Probably replace MAYBE to BABY :D. Also, make it,

SO REP ME BABY?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:37, topic:445054”][quote author=Krim link=topic=547744.msg4020890#msg4020890 date=1340004036]

“it seems silly to keep the 10 commandments everyone should boycott javascript and html but i cant play every note of valve though, given their incredible network” -dicklord

Does this dicklord person come up with a run-on sentence that makes no sense whatsoever, but somehow flows proportionally?
[/quote]

Dicklord is an IRC bot, not an actual person.

Everyone thinks it’s a person, lol.[/quote]
MIND=BLOWN.
